sentences.english: He says if you could stand on the Moon and watch the total lunar eclipse, the view would be even more dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 如果能在月亮上看月全食，场景会更令人惊奇。

sentences.english: During a total eclipse, the Sun's disk is completely occulted by the Moon.
sentences.chinese: 在日全食期间，太阳将被月球完全覆盖。

sentences.english: Remarkably, the total lunar eclipse coincided with the date of the December Solstice.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，这次月全食恰好发生在冬至日。

sentences.english: It is this effect that leads to the difference between total and annular eclipses.
sentences.chinese: 正是这个原因导致了日全食和日环食的区别。

sentences.english: The next total solar eclipse will occur on 11 July, 2010.
sentences.chinese: 下次日全食将会发生在2010年7月11日。

sentences.english: The first total lunar eclipse will occurs on June 16, 2011, Bejing time.
sentences.chinese: 今年第一次月全食将发生在北京时间16日凌晨。

sentences.english: Our sky chart shows you the total solar eclipse as seen from Wuhan, China, today.
sentences.chinese: 航空图显示，我国武汉可以首个看到今天日全食。

sentences.english: In the inner part, the umbra, that's where the eclipse is total.
sentences.chinese: 而在中心部分，本影就是日全食。

sentences.english: For example, there won't be another total solar eclipse until November 2012.
sentences.chinese: 下一次日全食的发生要等到2012年的11月了。

sentences.english: Then when was the last time that we had a total lunar eclipse occur on the same date as the winter solstice?
sentences.chinese: 那么上一次人类在冬至时节看到月全食是什么时候呢？

sentences.english: Other opportunities to see the total phase of this eclipse of the Sun were also hard to come by.
sentences.chinese: 看到这次日全食的全食阶段的机会来之不易。

sentences.english: Other opportunities to see the total phase of this eclipse of the Sun were also hard to come by.
sentences.chinese: 看到这次日全食的全食阶段的机会来之不易。

sentences.english: Total solar eclipse to come, longest in 500 years.
sentences.chinese: 日全食历时最长的一次是百年难遇。

sentences.english: A total solar eclipse darkens the skies in Chongqing municipality in China.
sentences.chinese: 当日全食食甚来临，重庆市的天空被一片黑暗笼罩。

sentences.english: Conveniently checked total solar eclipse was visible material.
sentences.chinese: 趁便查啦一下日全食地材料。

sentences.english: Did you know that the longest total solar eclipse of the 20th Century was just over 7 minutes?
sentences.chinese: 你知道20世纪最长的日全食正好超过7分钟吗？

definition: an annular eclipse of the sun
fresh produce and freshly prepared foods
